description.value:
Prerequisites @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.BASCKOPvNGgoHGid]{Achaekek's Grip}, @Compendium[pf2e.feats-srd.bzKBUK6CH8tuLCfo]{Advanced Red Mantis Magic}

To resurrect a creature you’ve slain, a spellcaster must counteract your influence on its death. The DC of this check is equal to your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher.

In addition, add two 5th-level spells to your Red Mantis assassin spellbook—both spells must be chosen from the following options:

  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.YvXKGlHOt7mdW2jZ]{Death Ward},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.scTRIrTfXquVYHGw]{Drop Dead},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.RCbLd7dfquHnuvrZ]{False Vision},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.U58aQWJ47VrI36yP]{Hallucination},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.Ucf8eynbZMfUucjE]{Illusory Scene},
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.9BnhadUO8FMLmeZ3]{Mind Probe}, or
  • @Compendium[pf2e.spells-srd.R9xqCBblkS5KE4y7]{Sending}.

You gain a 5th-level spell slot that you can use to prepare a spell from your Red Mantis assassin spellbook.
